PAD_Plaque.synopsis: A plaque outside a room in the Temple of Shar. The orthon has since made this area his lair, but the plaque refers to its original purpose.
PAD_Plaque.how_to_trigger: Interact with the plaque outside the orthon's lair.

PAD_Plaque_0.speaker: Narrator
PAD_Plaque_0.context: NodeContext: Reading the text of an ancient plaque outside a room in the Temple of Shar
